DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize , double-blinded , comparative study . Patients randomized completion induction phase therapy . Sample-size 50 HIV-seronegative patient culture-positive , drug susceptible TB treatment arm . The first 75 patient randomize 2:1 900 mg:600 mg rifapentine . The second 75 patient randomize 2:1 1200 mg:600 mg rifapentine . The DSMB review tolerability safety data first 21 patient enrol ( 900 mg 600 mg dos ) approve proceed enrollment 1200 mg dose .
